notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: Before the study, a written consent was obtained from the Central Council of Nurses and Midwives (dated from 20/03/2017) to carry out the study through the Regional Chambers of Nurses and Midwives. This procedure has been approved by the Bioethics Committee of the Medical University of Bialystok (dated from 28/09/2017).
